value:
So this is the kingdom of Askr... I've
heard this land is rife with conflict.
Seems like my kind of place.

There's plenty of fresh meat here. I
should try recruiting some to serve
His Majesty. You don't mind, do you?

Justice and purpose are pretty words,
but they won't stop a blade. In this
life, you must rely on yourself.

Need someone hunted down?
Remember, I am General Petrine!
I have never failed, nor will I ever!

Do you like your meat rare? Or do
you like it charbroiled? Of course
I'm talking about steak! What else?

Another one from the Order of
Heroes, eh? Be sure to support
$Nf!

The Daein army's motto is "Success
or failure, life or death." I am General
Petrine, and I forge my own fate!

Come now! I've put so much
kindling to the torch today, but
I haven't even broken a sweat.

Y-Your... Your Majesty... Forgive me...
Please... I will not fail you again.

So you've seen fit to value me,
as well you should! Keep it up.

I am General Petrine, of the Four
Riders of Daein. I'll roast your
foes, just as ordered!

Justice and purpose are pretty words,
but they won't stop a blade. In this
life, you must rely on yourself.$k$pThose who can't keep a cool head
in battle may soon find it separated
from their shoulders.$k$pYou, however...are not typical. And I
am no ordinary beorc. You must have
deduced that much already...$k$pThis brand on my chest is proof
of the beast blood surging through
my veins. It sets me apart.$k$pWe all have our dark secrets,
Summoner. What say you share
one of yours? It's only fair...
はあっ
逝っちまいな！
きゃぁあっ
負ける…？
Hope you like your meat charbroiled!
I'll cook you alive!
You anger me, you know that?
Curse whatever gods you hold.
Your Majesty... Forgive me...
くくく…
General Petrine, of the Four Riders of Daein. Yes, you heard me correctly.
Dog's breath! Do you need a lesson in manners?
You seek the friendship of those hairy devils too, hmm? Hmph. What an absolutely stupefying world.
The Daein army's motto is "Success or failure, life or death." Remember those words.
You know, I think I'll keep you! Yes, I do think you'll make a grand souvenir.
*laugh* You really do know how to sweet-talk a girl, don't you?
Do you like your meat rare? I'll roast your foes to order.
Let the hunt begin!
What now?
Wipe them out!
